text: Dustin Luis Pedroia (born August 17, 1983 in Woodland, California) is a Major League Baseball player for the Boston Red Sox. He played college baseball at Arizona State University. He is and . He won the 2007 American League Rookie of the Year award. == Other websites == * *Baseball Reference minor league statistics *Minor League Splits and Situational Stats *No. 45 - MLN FAB50 Baseball 2005 - Minor League News - Situational Stats *No. 23 - MLN FAB50 Baseball 2006 - Minor League News Category:Baseball players from California Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:1983 births Category:Living people
title: Dustin Pedroia
